trans-unit.source: The interactive window has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: The interactive window has already been initialized.

trans-unit.source: Replace the current submission with a subsequent submission (after having previously navigated backwards).
trans-unit.target: Replace the current submission with a subsequent submission (after having previously navigated backwards).

trans-unit.source: Replace the current submission with a previous submission.
trans-unit.target: Replace the current submission with a previous submission.

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the editor window, leaving history and execution context intact.
trans-unit.target: Clears the contents of the editor window, leaving history and execution context intact.

trans-unit.source: Command '{0}' failed: {1}
trans-unit.target: Command '{0}' failed: {1}

trans-unit.source: [command-name]
trans-unit.target: [command-name]

trans-unit.source: First press, select the submission containing the cursor. Second press, select all text in the window.
trans-unit.target: First press, select the submission containing the cursor. Second press, select all text in the window.

trans-unit.source: Replace the current submission with a subsequent submission beginning with the same text (after having previously navigated backwards).
trans-unit.target: Replace the current submission with a subsequent submission beginning with the same text (after having previously navigated backwards).

trans-unit.source: Replace the current submission with a previous submission beginning with the same text.
trans-unit.target: Replace the current submission with a previous submission beginning with the same text.

trans-unit.source: Paste and execute the selection before any pending input in the interactive buffer.
trans-unit.target: Paste and execute the selection before any pending input in the interactive buffer.

trans-unit.source: Within the current submission, evaluate the current submission.
trans-unit.target: Within the current submission, evaluate the current submission.

trans-unit.source: Within a previous submission, append the previous submission to the current submission.
trans-unit.target: Within a previous submission, append the previous submission to the current submission.

trans-unit.source: Paste the selection at the end of interactive buffer, leave caret at the end of input.
trans-unit.target: Paste the selection at the end of interactive buffer, leave caret at the end of input.

trans-unit.source: At the end of the current submission, replace the current submission with a subsequent submission (after having previously navigated backwards).
trans-unit.target: At the end of the current submission, replace the current submission with a subsequent submission (after having previously navigated backwards).

trans-unit.source: Elsewhere, move the cursor down one line.
trans-unit.target: Elsewhere, move the cursor down one line.

trans-unit.source: A command with the name '{0}' has already been registered.
trans-unit.target: A command with the name '{0}' has already been registered.

trans-unit.source: If the current submission appears to be complete, evaluate it. Otherwise, insert a new line.
trans-unit.target: If the current submission appears to be complete, evaluate it. Otherwise, insert a new line.

trans-unit.source: Clear the current submission.
trans-unit.target: Clear the current submission.

trans-unit.source: Display help on specified command, or all available commands and key bindings if none specified.
trans-unit.target: Display help on specified command, or all available commands and key bindings if none specified.

trans-unit.source: An internal error has occurred in the Interactive window. Please restart Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: An internal error has occurred in the Interactive window. Please restart Visual Studio.

trans-unit.target: Keyboard shortcuts:

trans-unit.source: Reset the execution environment to the initial state, keep history.
trans-unit.target: Reset the execution environment to the initial state, keep history.

trans-unit.source: Reset to a clean environment (only mscorlib referenced), do not run initialization script.
trans-unit.target: Reset to a clean environment (only mscorlib referenced), do not run initialization script.

trans-unit.target: Insert a new line.
